translation.Name: <color=#b8b188>Concord: </color><color=mythical>All Necessary Means</color>
translation.Description:
General Issac
With the last remaining military and civilians fleeing to the port of Jahra Industrial in order to escape to the island, they've brought a horde of zombies - one of which has been heavily mutated. The Concord can handle the horde with a device, while you handle this mutated zombie.You will need a lot of ammo.
translation.Condition_0: Liberate Jahra Industrial From Boss Zombie {0}/1
